data.title: Usually a busy place during afternoon week days.
data.text: Orders are usually correct when older folks are working - not so much with younger ones - many of which are not even familiar with the menu (especially cofee drinks). And a charge for a cup of water when other items are ordered? I don't think so.........

data.title: Lunch
data.text: I don't really like this  McDonald's much , not very clean , I don't think the service is good , I don't recommend it much !!

data.title: Cool New Design
data.text:
The modern design and color scheme here is pretty neat here. 
The customer service was friendly. 
My order number was called pretty quick and it was lunch time during visit.

data.title: bad service
data.text: There were two people in line, a guy in front of me and myself.  There were 7 workers walking around.  The cashier didn't have the proper change for the guy in front of me, so she turned a shouted, "Need change!"  While we were waiting fro someone to respond, I asked her if she could open another register or have someone open one and take my order.  she said, "I have to make change."  then the one who came to give her the change said, "Don't rush me."     NOT GOOD SERVICE

data.title: Average McD's experience
data.text: Visited drive-thru during rush hour.  Average wait time, food and beverage exactly as expected from McD's.
